title: RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Module Overview
content: RAK12044 is a WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor module that extends the WisBlock system with a DRV5056A4QDBZR Hall Sensor from Texas Instruments. It comes with a ready-to-use software library and tutorial, making it easy to build a magnetic field data acquisition system. Magnetic field data is interfaced via I2C. Additionally, the RAK12044 can be mounted to the sensor slot of the WisBlock Base board.
parent_content: RAK12044 is a WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor module that extends the WisBlock system with a DRV5056A4QDBZR Hall Sensor from Texas Instruments. It comes with a ready-to-use software library and tutorial, making it easy to build a magnetic field data acquisition system. Magnetic field data is interfaced via I2C. Additionally, the RAK12044 can be mounted to the sensor slot of the WisBlock Base board.

title: RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12044 Mounting Mechanism on WisBlock Base
content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12044 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12044 module can be mounted on the slots: **A, C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Mounting
parent_content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12044 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12044 module can be mounted on the slots: **A, C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Mounting

title: RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Pinout and Compatibility [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12044 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Pinout Diagram  
> **TIP:** NOTE  
When the RAK12044 is used with other sensor modules powered by **3V3_S** together, it can not be mounted on slot **B**.
parent_content:
The RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12044 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12044 WisBlock Hall Effect Sensor Pinout Diagram  
> **TIP:** NOTE  
When the RAK12044 is used with other sensor modules powered by **3V3_S** together, it can not be mounted on slot **B**.  
The **WisBlock Sensor** connector is used to this module and the IO used for **ALERT** pin at **Pin 12** will depend on where sensor slot the module is plugged in. The table shows the compatible pins used by different sensor slots:  
**ALERT Pin**  
| Slot A | Slot C | Slot D | Slot E | Slot F |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| IO1    | IO3    | IO5    | IO4    | IO6    |
